title: A Hockey Story That Became a Popular TV Show
summary: Rachel Reid wrote books about hockey players who fall in love, and now her story is a TV show called Heated Rivalry. The show is very popular, with many people watching and talking about it. It started as a book she wrote online, and she did not think it could become a TV show. The show has two main characters, Shane and Ilya, who are hockey players from different teams. They keep their relationship secret because they are rivals. People like the show because it shows love and friendship in sports. Rachel is happy that so many people enjoy her story.

background_read: This article is about a TV show called Heated Rivalry, which is based on books by Rachel Reid. The books are about hockey players who have a secret relationship. Rachel wrote the books online first, and she did not think they could be made into a TV show. Now, the show is very popular, and many people watch it and talk about it. It helps show that stories about love and sports can be enjoyed by everyone.
